Resource.name: ApprovalRequestsService
Resource.Summary: This API enables you to invoke the interfaces defined on 'ApprovalRequestsService'.

Function.Description: Invoke the method 'GetApprovalRequestList' on this service.
Invoke the method 'GetOpenApprovalRequestList' on this service.
Invoke the method 'GetAllApprovalRequestsList' on this service.

DataTypes.Description: The 'DataTypes' defines the types referenced by the 'Functions'. It is only for QA, not for info dev.
